description: This file contains CMake functions and macros for managing header-only library installation configurations, generating CMake config files and pkg-config files, and handling dependencies and installation paths within a CMake-based build system.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: A function to generate and install CMake configuration files for header-only libraries, managing dependencies, target properties, and installation paths.

methods.name: HeaderOnlyInstallPackageConfig
methods.description: A function to generate and install pkg-config files for header-only libraries, considering compile options, include directories, and library dependencies.
